tool_description: An API showing all the latest Climate Change News around the world
name: Cimate Change Live
title: Cimate Change Live

api_list.name: Get Individual News Source News
api_list.description: Gets News about Climate Change from specific news resource
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cimate-change-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/thetimes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cimate-change-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://cimate-change-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspapersid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cimate-change-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Climate Change News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all news about Climate Change from all over the world
